```{r}
# Loading libraries
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(readxl)
```

```{r}
# Importing college scorecard data
SC2014 <- read_csv("Data/College_Scorecard_Raw_Data_05192025/MERGED2014_15_PP.csv")

# Importing IPEDS data
IPEDS = read_excel("Data/IPEDS_2014-15_Final/ADM2014.xlsx")
```

```{r}
SC = SC2014 %>% select(UNITID, INSTNM ,COSTT4_A, AVGFACSAL, PFTFAC, C150_4, RET_FT4, MEDIAN_HH_INC, PRGMOFR, CIPCODE1, MD_EARN_WNE_P6, MD_EARN_WNE_P8, MD_EARN_WNE_P10)

EducationData = merge(IPEDS, SC, by = "UNITID") %>% select(UNITID, INSTNM, everything())
```
